summary: This is a brief email chain from December 10, 2018, discussing communication about Jeffrey Epstein. The emails show internal coordination regarding whether a brief write-up about Epstein was sent to and acknowledged by a senior official at the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain's subject and topic is about Jeffrey Epstein, indicating he is the central figure being discussed.

events.title: Internal email discussion about Epstein
events.description: An internal email chain discusses whether a brief write-up about Jeffrey Epstein was sent to and acknowledged by the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated December 10, 2018, with the subject 'Epstein'.
The emails indicate internal coordination about communicating information regarding Jeffrey Epstein to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).
One participant states that a brief write-up was sent and that 'we were open on it,' but no response had been received yet.
The correspondence suggests ongoing official interest or action regarding Epstein in late 2018.
